name: The Mandate
blurb: As the captain of a Mandate starship, you lead a crew through the galaxy where they will adapt and grow as they fight alongside you.

rewards.reward: No Reward
Loyalist\r\n==============================\r\nDigital PDF Concept Book + Wallpapers + Social Media Icon Packs

Warrant Officer\r\n==============================\r\nDigital PDF Concept Book + Wallpapers + Social Media Icon Packs + Digital download of The Mandate + Exclusive Kickstarter decal packs for ship + Digital Soundtrack

Midshipman\r\n==============================\r\nDigital PDF Concept Book + Wallpapers + Social Media Icon Packs + Digital download of The Mandate + Exclusive Kickstarter decal packs for ship + Digital Soundtrack
Cossack Cornet ============================== All rewards from Midshipman + 3 first content updates + Lore Codex

Ensign\r\n==============================\r\nAll rewards from Midshipman + Ship designer & Character creation early access + "Season pass" [3 first content updates and first expansion pack] + Lore Codex + Beta Access
Arsenal Warden\r\n==============================\r\nAll rewards from Ensign + 3D ship models for 3D printing
Cossack Captain\r\n==============================\r\nAll rewards from Arsenal Warden + Alpha Access + Great Captains Doc
Lieutenant Captain\r\n==============================\r\nAll rewards from Cossack Captain + Name a Marine + 1 Extra digital download of the Mandate

War Commissioner\r\n==============================\r\nAll rewards from Cossack Captain + We will send you a Mandate NPC character sheet for you to fill out. We will turn your personalized officer with your name, class, skills into an NPC in the shipped game (within reason) + 2 Extra digital downloads of the Mandate

Second Major of the Guard\r\n==============================\r\nAll rewards from Cossack Captain + We will send you a Mandate NPC character sheet for you to fill out. We will turn your personalized captain with your name, class, skills into an NPC in the shipped game (within reason) + Your name engraved on wall of heroes + Journal Entry + 2 Extra digital downloads of the Mandate

Captain 1st rank\r\n==============================\r\nAll rewards from Cossack Captain + Your name engraved on wall of heroes + Journal Entry + We will send you a Mandate base design sheet for you to fill out. We will turn your base design into a star base placed in the game world in the shipped game (within reason) + 2 Extra digital downloads of the Mandate

Premier Major of the Guard\r\n==============================\r\nAll rewards from Cossack Captain + Your name engraved on wall of heroes + Journal Entry + We will send you a Mandate weapon design sheet for you to fill out. We will turn your design into a powerful artifact weapon with its own backstory, visuals and stats in the shipped game (within reason) + 3 Extra digital downloads of the Mandate

Captain Commander\r\n==============================\r\nAll rewards from Cossack Captain + Your name engraved on wall of heroes + We will send you a Mandate level design document for you to fill out. We will turn your personalized space map or ship layout into a level in the shipped game (within reason) + 3 Extra digital downloads of the Mandate

Brigadier\r\n==============================\r\nAll rewards from Cossack Captain + We will send you a Mandate NPC character sheet and ship design document for you to fill out. We will turn your personalized captain and ship with your name, class, skills into an NPC in the shipped game (within reason) + Your name engraved on wall of heroes + Journal Entry + Design a ship encounter + 5 Extra digital downloads of the Mandate

Lieutenant Colonel of the Guard\r\n==============================\r\nAll rewards from Cossack Captain + We will send you a Mandate merchant NPC sheet for you to fill out. We will turn your design into an artifact dealer with his own ship, backstory and rare items for sale in the shipped game (within reason) + Your name engraved on wall of heroes + Journal Entry + Design a travelling merchant + 5 Extra digital downloads of the Mandate

General of Fortification\r\n==============================\r\nAll rewards from Cossack Captain + Your name engraved on wall of heroes + Journal Entry +  We will send you a Mandate mercenary company design doc. Specify the captains, their motto and personal symbol and the configuration of their battle squadron. We will turn your personalized mercenary company into a force to be reckoned with in the shipped game (within reason) + 11 Extra digital downloads of the Mandate

Rear Admiral\r\n==============================\r\nAll rewards from Cossack Captain + Your name engraved on wall of heroes + Journal Entry +  We will send you a Mandate squadron design doc. Specify the captains, the ships and armaments of the battle squadron. We will turn your personalized battle squadron into a force to be reckoned with in the shipped game (within reason) + 11 Extra digital downloads of the Mandate

Engineer General\r\n==============================\r\nAll rewards from Cossack Captain + Your name engraved on wall of heroes + Journal Entry +  We will send you a NPC sheet for you to fill out. We will turn your design into a famous commander in Mandate history. For your services the Mandate has commissioned an equestrian statue of you astride a horse or based on your own idea (within reason). Your statue will be placed in a central location on a star base and you will receive a 3D printer model + 11 Extra digital downloads of the Mandate

General Field Cannon Master\r\n==============================\r\nAll rewards from Cossack Captain + Your name engraved on wall of heroes + Journal Entry +  We will send you a NPC sheet for you to fill out. We will turn your design into a famous person in Mandate history. For your services the Mandate has commissioned a portrait of you. You will also get to pick the pose of this painting (within reason). Your painting will be placed in a central location on a star base and you will receive a signed digital high resolution version of the painting [print available on request]. + 11 Extra digital downloads of the Mandate

Scourge of the Mandate\r\n==============================\r\nAll rewards from Cossack Captain + Your name engraved on wall of heroes + Journal Entry +  We will send you a Pirate captain NPC sheet for you to fill out as well as a design sheet for your own custom cyber parrot! In addition you will design the pirate fleet, its captains and officers who accompany the Scourge and his flagship. We will turn your design into a notorious pirate with a dangerous fleet who will hunt down both players and peaceful merchantmen alike. You will receive a 3D printer model of your custom cyber parrot and a signed digital high resolution painting of your pirate captain to scare your friends with  + 11 Extra digital downloads of the Mandate

General Admiral\r\n==============================\r\nAll rewards from Cossack Captain + Your name engraved on wall of heroes + Journal Entry +  We will send you several design sheets to flesh out a mini faction with major NPCs, its own backstory and customized ships. We will work with you to tie the mini faction into the Mandate universe (within reason)  + 11 Extra digital downloads of the Mandate

Grand Admiral\r\n==============================\r\nAll rewards from Cossack Captain + Your name engraved on wall of heroes + Journal Entry +  We will send you several design documents to flesh out a legendary ship that was lost. We will work with you to come up with the backstory and a unique visual design for this ship. In addition you will receive a 3D printer model of the unique ship. + 11 Extra digital downloads of the Mandate

Lord High Admiral\r\n==============================\r\nAll rewards from Cossack Captain + Your name engraved on wall of heroes + Journal Entry +  We will send you several design docs and work with you to develop a quest chain for the Mandate  + 11 Extra digital downloads of the Mandate + Executive producer title in the credits list
